title: Which chapters should we do from ALLEN module for biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: First make sure you are thorough with NCERT including all the diagrams and flowcharts. Now coming to the question…yes, you need to have some extra knowledge about some particular topics which I'm mentioning below: EvolutionEcologyPlant PhysiologyMolecular GeneticsHope this would help!! ALL THE BEST

There is no more time left for neet so I want to give you advice that don't prepare any chapter from Allen module as they are very very bulky and you can't remember so much and at the time of examination you will get confused so study limited and study focused. You can go through notes
